nodes.text: A squad served in the military of the Galactic Empire and served under Captain A'Shar Farless at the Imperial security complex on the planet Scarif. The squad consisted of stormtroopers, coastal defender stormtroopers, Imperial officers, and Imperial ground crewmen. Governor Wilhuff Tarkin assigned the squad to Farless after Tarkin was impressed in his ability to inspire actions in his troops. When Captain Farless met his new squad he gave them an inspiring speech about fighting together.
